MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  WA8 postcode area of Cronton, affecting properties in Pex Hill, Pex Hill Avenue and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  7:54AM.  Our engineers are on site to investigate the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:15AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.40AM on 17th October 2020.
